page.title: 16HEALTH CARE
page.content: I WISH TO DESCRIBE SOME MEDICAL CARE,GIVEN TO AN 80 YR.OLD LADY ON JUNE 18th.1985{AN OPERATION TOOK PLACE {TO REMOVE THE HEAD OF THE LEFT FEMUR AND REPLACE THIS WITH A METAL AND PLASTIC ARTIFICIAL JOINT, AT HARLOW WOOD ORTHOPAEDIC HOSPITAL. FOR 24hrs.AFTER THE OPERATION CARE WAS GIVEN IN A RECOVERY WARD BY NURSES UNTIL SHE WAS READY TO RETURN TO WARD 6.REGULAR DRESSING OF THE WOUND, TOGETHER WITH EXERCISE AND PHYSIOTHERAPY ENABLED HER TO WALK SLOWLY USING CRUTCHES. ON 6th.JULY,DESPITE INFECTION WHICH HAD DEVELOPED,SHE RETURNED HOME BY AMBULANCE. ON 16th.JULY THE INFECTION HAS NOW CLEARED UP,AFTER THE DOCTOR HAS TREATED THE INFECTION WITH SEPTRIN TABLETS.THIS OPERATION HAD BEEN A REPEAT-SHE NOW HAS TWO NEW HIP JOINTS.
